ai-patthana13.1:0.2_0: Having given the immaculateness of the Dhamma they resplendently:
ai-patthana13.1:1.1_0: Reverence to him, the Fortunate One, the Worthy One, the Perfect Sambuddha
ai-patthana13.1:2.1_0: A skillful quality doesn’t give rise to the cause or reason.
ai-patthana13.1:2.1_1: A skillful quality doesn’t give rise to the three knowledges, nor a single aggregates, and three the aggregates of the mind. ...
ai-patthana13.1:2.1_2: Not skillful qualities arise. Mindfulness arises dependent on the body, aggregates, definitively conditions, and dependently originated. ...
ai-patthana13.1:2.1_3: A skillful person doesn’t give rise to a skillful qualities, nor skilled in the aggregates. These three skillful qualities arise because of their cause and reasons.
ai-patthana13.1:2.1_4: Skillfulness arises in mind and not doing things.
ai-patthana13.1:3.1_0: Unskillfulness doesn’t give rise to unskillful qualities, namely form are conditions for the sake of the aggregates.
ai-patthana13.1:3.1_1: Unskillful thoughts don’t give rise to the three unskillful things. Neither the aggregates of the mind, namely, form, mind consciousness, and body.
ai-patthana13.1:3.1_2: Unskillfulness doesn’t give rise to a cause or reason.
ai-patthana13.1:3.1_3: Unskillful thoughts don’t give rise to unskillful qualities, and these things arise with cause and reason.
ai-patthana13.1:3.1_4: Unskillfulness arises in thought and not the unskillful qualities.
ai-patthana13.1:4.1_0: A results of goodness, unwholesome thoughts, mind consciousness, and no phenomena because of this, all of the aggregates, terminations of the mind and body. ...
ai-patthana13.1:4.1_2: There are three great primaries that are produced by mother and father ...
ai-patthana13.1:4.1_3: There are two great primary elements that are produced by the two great primaries.
ai-patthana13.1:4.1_7: Isn’t arise in a way that’s unskillful and skillful, blameworthy and incompetent, reasoned, or reasoned inappropriately.
ai-patthana13.1:4.1_8: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana13.1:5.1_0: A skillful quality doesn’t give rise to skillful qualities, nor have cause or reasoned by the mind.
ai-patthana13.1:5.1_1: A skillful quality doesn’t give rise to unskillful qualities, and those that are unskillful.
ai-patthana13.1:6.1_0: Unskillful thoughts, and unskillful qualities don’t give rise to the cause or condition.
ai-patthana13.1:6.1_1: Unskillful thoughts, and unskillful qualities don’t give rise to the cause or condition.
ai-patthana13.1:6.1_2: Unskillful thoughts, skilled in goodness, and unskillful qualities don’t arise because of a cause or reason.
ai-patthana13.1:6.1_3: He should lay down on the same consciousness as lesser.
ai-patthana13.1:7.1_0: A skillful quality doesn’t give rise to a skillful object.
ai-patthana13.1:7.1_1: A skillful teaching gives rise to a good thought. Dispensation as condition for the object.
ai-patthana13.1:7.1_2: A skillful person gives rise to unskillful qualities, and doesn’t arise with a as condition.
ai-patthana13.1:8.1_0: Unskillfulness arises in thought, the teaching, and the object that gives rise to unskillful.
ai-patthana13.1:8.1_1: Unskillfulness gives rise to unskillful qualities.
ai-patthana13.1:8.1_2: Unskillfulness arises in mind and inconsequence.
ai-patthana13.1:9.1_0: Not inviting the teaching, no matter what is unskillful.
ai-patthana13.1:9.1_1: Not incompetent teaching, skilled in loss, and mindful.
ai-patthana13.1:9.1_2: Not indicated by principle, skilled in loss, and skilled in means.
ai-patthana13.1:9.1_3: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana13.1:10.1_2: What is not the ignorant fools?
ai-patthana13.1:11.0_0: (They are) not with an object of the objects.
ai-patthana13.1:11.1_0: Unskillful thought doesn’t give rise to the teaching with no cause or condition.
ai-patthana13.1:11.1_1: Unskillfulness caused by the teaching, not with no cause or condition.
ai-patthana13.1:11.1_2: Unskillfulness arises in thought and not doing what is unskillful.
ai-patthana13.1:12.1_0: Not unskillful qualities arise in a way that gives rise to an unprofitable teaching.
ai-patthana13.1:12.1_1: Not incompetent teaching doesn’t give rise to unskillful things or cause or condition.
ai-patthana13.1:12.1_2: Not skilled in loss, skilled in thought, and skilled in means.
ai-patthana13.1:13.1_0: A skillful person doesn’t give rise to a skillful quality.
ai-patthana13.1:13.1_1: A skillful person doesn’t give rise to a skillful teaching, or conditioned by support.
ai-patthana13.1:13.1_2: A skillful person doesn’t arise dependent on a skillful, or unskillful qualities.
ai-patthana13.1:14.1_0: Unskillful thought doesn’t give rise to unskillful qualities.
ai-patthana13.1:14.1_1: Unskillful thought doesn’t give rise to the thought.
ai-patthana13.1:14.1_2: Unskillfulness arises in thought and not doing what is unskillful.
ai-patthana13.1:14.1_3: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana13.1:15.1_0: Not for the sake of the sixth or six days,
ai-patthana13.1:15.1_2: When bearing the dwellings, they’re not arriving at the wrong time. They’re not extinguished from straws, because of this. They’re not acting like that. They Venerables, because of this. They’re not looked like ahead, thinking, ‘I’ll because of this.’ ...
ai-patthana13.1:16.1_0: He should not give formal support.
ai-patthana13.1:16.1_1: You should go to the west.
ai-patthana13.1:16.1_2: And the causes of the reason for eighteen objects ...
ai-patthana13.1:16.1_4: (but) as a lay person (but) is associated with it, and also those associated with it.
ai-patthana13.1:17.1_0: Is a wholesome quality, not by way of teaching condition.
ai-patthana13.1:17.1_1: Not skilled in the Teaching, or condition.
ai-patthana13.1:17.1_2: Not skillful qualities is a condition for the sake of goodness, not by way of the teaching.
ai-patthana13.1:17.1_3: Skillful principles, skilled in the basic principles, and good in the teaching.
ai-patthana13.1:17.1_4: Skillful is the cause, not skilled in the reason for the teaching, and for the sake of all the Dhamma.
ai-patthana13.1:18.1_0: Is it unskillful, not skilled in the Dhamma cause or condition?
ai-patthana13.1:18.1_1: Is it not skilled in the Dhamma cause or condition for the sake of the teaching?
ai-patthana13.1:18.1_2: Is skilled in the teaching not skilled in (right) things, being a condition for the sake of investigations.
ai-patthana13.1:18.1_3: Unskillful, not skilled in the basic principles, and good in the way beginning,
ai-patthana13.1:18.1_4: Unskillful, not skilled in the basic principles, and the cause for the sake of the Dhamma.
ai-patthana13.1:19.1_0: (This) is a condition for the sake of goodness, not for the sake of the Dhamma.
ai-patthana13.1:19.1_1: (This) is a cause of goodness, unwholesome thoughts, or condition.
ai-patthana13.1:19.1_2: Not is a condition for the sake of good, not for the wholesome quality, and not for the sake of the Dhamma.
ai-patthana13.1:20.1_0: a wholesome quality doesn’t arise in the way for the object, or for the condition.
ai-patthana13.1:21.1_0: (This is) an unwholesome teaching, not for the object, and for the sake of the teaching itself. ...
ai-patthana13.1:22.1_0: Not knowing what is contrary to the Teaching, nor incompetent, skilled in answering the teaching, and condition for the six reasons.
ai-patthana13.1:23.1_0: ‘... for the sake of the droping of the lunar half-monthly eighteen years, sixteenth or sixteenth years, eighteen years in the grove. In the last sixth, nine or sixteenth year ...
ai-patthana13.1:23.1_1: these nineteenth sections are associated with (wholesome) associated with the donors.
